description: List the grants associated with an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application whose grants you want to list.

nested_items.name: Grants
nested_items.description: An array list of structures that describe the requested grants.

nested_items.name: GrantType
nested_items.description: The type of the selected grant.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationCode
nested_items.description: Configuration options for the authorization_code grant type.

nested_items.name: RedirectUris
nested_items.description: A list of URIs that are valid locations to redirect a user's browser after the user is authorized.

nested_items.name: JwtBearer
nested_items.description: Configuration options for the urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer grant type.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedTokenIssuers
nested_items.description: A list of allowed token issuers trusted by the Identity Center instances for this application.

nested_items.name: TrustedTokenIssuerArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the trusted token issuer.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedAudiences
nested_items.description: An array list of authorized audiences, or applications, that can consume the tokens generated by the associated trusted token issuer.

nested_items.name: RefreshToken
nested_items.description: Configuration options for the refresh_token grant type.

nested_items.name: TokenExchange
nested_items.description: Configuration options for the urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:token-exchange grant type.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
